name: GameJoy: Definitely Not a Gameboy
description:
Entry for GB Jam 8

Controls

  • press on the top of the console to eject the game
  • arrows - movement
  • z - skip dialogue, press buttons

Tools used

  • Unity
  • Aseprite
  • Photoshop
  • Sfxr
  • FL studios
